Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University (SMVDU) was established under an Act of the J&K State Legislature in 1999. It is the first fully residential technical university in Jammu and Kashmir. Recognized by the UGC under Sections 2(f) & 12(B) of the UGC Act of 1956, it has made significant contributions to education and research. The university ranks highly among architecture and engineering institutions as per the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF 2023) by the MHRD, Government of India. Located near the holy town of Katra, it offers a serene environment conducive to learning.

Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University (SMVDU) is a fully residential and technical university, established in 1999 under an Act of the J&K State Legislature. Recognized by the UGC, SMVDU is known for academic excellence, serene surroundings, and state-of-the-art facilities. Situated 14 km from Katra and 40 km from Jammu, the university fosters innovation, research, and a vibrant campus life.
Explore the universityâ€™s rich history, its foundational vision, and how to connect with us for any queries or details about our campus.
